Uses of Package
org.gicentre.utils.colour

  • Packages that use org.gicentre.utils.colour 
    Package Description
    org.gicentre.utils.colour
    Colour-related utilities for use with Processing.
    org.gicentre.utils.stat
    Utilities to support the creation of statistical graphics with Processing.
  • Classes in org.gicentre.utils.colour used by org.gicentre.utils.colour 
    Class and Description
    ColourConverter.WhitePoint
    Whitepoint colour calibration settings.
    ColourRule
    Colour rule class for storing a single colour rule.
    ColourTable
    Colour table class for storing colour rules associated with a spatial object.
    PickerListener
    Interface for any class that wishes to be informed when a colour has been chosen from the colour picker.
  • Classes in org.gicentre.utils.colour used by org.gicentre.utils.stat 
    Class and Description
    ColourTable
    Colour table class for storing colour rules associated with a spatial object.
